unnormalised: Breaking News: Holi Celebrations Preponed in Mathura!
normalised: Breaking News: Holi Celebrations Preponed in Mathura!

unnormalised: Due to unforeseen circumstances, the Holi celebrations in Mathura, originally scheduled for 25/03/2024, have been prepone by 2 days. This decision came after a meeting held at 10:00 PM last night between local authorities and temple representatives.
normalised: Due to unforeseen circumstances, the Holi celebrations in Mathura, originally scheduled for twenty fifth March two thousand and twenty four, have been preponed by two days. This decision came after a meeting held at ten p.m. last night between local authorities and temple representatives.

unnormalised: The revised dates are now set for 23/03/2024 and 24/03/2024. Sources say this change is due to a potential clash with another significant event that was unexpectedly scheduled for the 25th.
normalised: The revised dates are now set for twenty third March two thousand and twenty four and twenty fourth March two thousand and twenty four. Sources say this change is due to a potential clash with another significant event that was unexpectedly scheduled for the twenty fifth.

unnormalised: Lathmar Holi in Barsana will now take place on 23/03/2024, starting at 11:00 AM. Nandgaon's Lathmar Holi is shifted to 24/03/2024, same time.
normalised: Lathmar Holi in Barsana will now take place on twenty third March two thousand and twenty four, starting at eleven a.m.. Nandgaon's Lathmar Holi is shifted to twenty fourth March two thousand and twenty four, same time.

unnormalised: Devotees planning to attend are requested to take note of these changes. Local administration is working to ensure smooth festivities and will provide updates regarding traffic and security arrangements latest by 22/03/2024, 6:00 PM.
normalised: Devotees planning to attend are requested to take note of these changes. Local administration is working to ensure smooth festivities and will provide updates regarding traffic and security arrangements latest by twenty second March two thousand and twenty four, six p.m..

unnormalised: "We understand this sudden change might inconvenience some, but we assure everyone that the spirit of Holi will remain the same," said Mr. Sharma, a local official, addressing the press at 08:30 AM today.
normalised: "We understand this sudden change might inconvenience some, but we assure everyone that the spirit of Holi will remain the same," said Mister Sharma, a local official, addressing the press at eight thirty a.m. today.

unnormalised: Further announcements related to specific events and timings will be broadcast on local news channels and social media platforms. Keep checking for updates between 06:00 PM to 07:00 PM daily.
normalised: Further announcements related to specific events and timings will be broadcast on local news channels and social media platforms. Keep checking for updates between six p.m. to seven p.m. daily.

unnormalised: Plan your trip accordingly and Happy Holi in advance! Remember to check the updated schedule; changes can happen anytime.
normalised: Plan your trip accordingly and Happy Holi in advance! Remember to check the updated schedule; changes can happen anytime.
